original: Police Officers looking to make some money on the side?

We have lots of opportunities for you to supplement your income.  For a few extra hours a week, you could easily double your salary.  Lookouts, tip-offs, getaway drivers, fake drug busts etc.  The usual stuff.  Send us a note to set up a meeting.  Try any funny business and we come after your family.
translated: 能够给你增收的机会很多。每周只需几个小时，就能让你收入翻倍。盯梢、通风报信、跑路司机、虚假逮捕毒贩，都可以。很简单的。发个消息过来，我们会安排见面。敢搞什么小动作，你的家人就等着吧。
